Posts.Content: Just wondering what people put on their fingernails to protect them whilst they do not have any fingernails. I am going through a shed load of plasters, which continually fall off when wet.
Posts.Title: A frivolous question!

Posts.Content: ronstar Hi Netball I did buy a load of finger plasters but gave up on them and switched to cutting up a non-adherent dressing pad to cover the nail bit then wrapping with micropore. I also bought some little things called finger cots (ebay, I think) - they are like little condoms for your fingers Then you can just cover the fingers that you need to when you're doing wet work e.g shower, washing Â hair etc Hope you find a solution! R Thanks. Ordered from eBay this morning
Posts.Title: A frivolous question!
